mapper.select: select count(1) from t_gateway_backup_file_info where gateway_id = #{gatewayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status != 3

select
from t_gateway_backup_file_info where gateway_id = #{gatewayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND status != 3 ORDER BY start_time DESC

select
from t_gateway_backup_file_info where status = 1 ORDER BY start_time ASC
